title: Field-Applicable Mathematics Education Leadership Development Program for Novice School Leaders (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in school administration and operation of basic mathematics curricula
context.additional_context: Project implementation to address mathematics education challenges faced by current school leaders in real-world educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can conduct field investigations and data analysis to improve the school mathematics curriculum.
Learners can design and implement teacher collaboration strategies for innovating mathematics education.
Learners can develop and evaluate the effectiveness of digital tool-based mathematics lesson improvement projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
